programme.title: Twisted Love
programme.desc: A man lives in denial of his wife's mental health but true loves comes into play and he chooses to keep his vows, no matter how much it hurts him. Will their love stand the test of time?

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 10
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Sadiq returns from national service just in time to meet his family knee deep in debt and nearly homeless. Confused and desperate to save his family, he strikes a deal with a notorious drug ring that becomes more than he bargained for.

programme.title: AMC Red Carpet - Radio Voice
programme.desc: AMC Red Carpet brings you exclusive red carpet interviews with Nollywood stars at the premieres of top Nollywood movies and other industry events such as award ceremonies.

programme.title: Lisa's Code
programme.desc: Lisa is a successful young lady in her own rights, but a victim of domestic abuse. She does not believe in the concept of love and marriage and has resolved to remain single for the rest of her life. Pascal believes he can change Lisa’s mind and challenges her to a game of love, but who will win when not all cards are on the table?

programme.title: In The Pursuit of Love
programme.desc: In his quest to find true love, a young CEO decides to disguise himself and hide his true identity. He meets a female who challenges his whole idea of love and hustle. Will this be his final bus stop?

programme.title: Besotted
programme.desc: Besotted revolves around Rita who seems to be fooled by what she thought was love for her boyfriend Michael, only for her to find out that he squandered her money on illegal activities. This leaves Rita devastated, she tries to turn him over to the police but the unexpected happens.

programme.title: AMC Music Lounge S6 - Khaid
programme.desc: AMC brings you legendary and undiscovered artists as they discuss all things music and beyond. Stay tuned for intimate interviews and live music performances.

programme.title: Stranger In My Bed
programme.desc: Selena seemingly great life becomes a nightmare when she wakes up with no

programme.title: Hell Mary
programme.desc: Mary, set to takeover her mother’s fashion empire, is used to getting her way. Taking an interest in Andre, the chief photographer, she decides to start work in her mother’s company. She becomes obsessed with him and does everything in her power to get his attention. Things take a diabolical turn when Andre constantly rebuffs her advances.

programme.title: Before I Go
programme.desc: AMCOP Exclusive Movie. Sam and Grace’s lives are changed forever after an accident renders Sam unable to moe and confined in a wheelchair for life. As Sam contemplates taking own life a chance meeting with a stranger changes everything.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep 4
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: The Hangout S1 - Ep12
programme.desc: A group of opinionated, social media-savvy millennials debate controversial topics on love, sex, friendship, and more.

programme.title: Burden
programme.desc: Stella suffers a devastating loss when her husband leaves her suddenly. She slowly finds happiness when she falls for the doctor that treats her, but things get complicated when her husband comes back to fight for their marriage.

programme.title: The Apartment
programme.desc: A nice guy has just moved into a new apartment but discovers he must share his space with a snappish ghost, who requires his help in finding her killer’s identity.

programme.title: Sisi Eko - Ep1
programme.desc: Eko is beautiful and knows it, so it is no surprise that she gets most of the male attention. Finding Mr Right, however, is proving to be complicated, as Mr Right must meet her '6-Cardinal Rules'. The romantic comedy series touches on important issues such as mental health, anxiety, and self-doubt.

programme.title: She Sees
programme.desc: A blind woman grapples with the psychological trauma of being abused by a Dr meant to care for her but a chance meeting brings them together again but this time she see him for his crimes.

programme.title: Nepa
programme.desc: A troubled young man takes revenge against the Nigerian electric power authority when the constant lack of power supply leads to the sudden death of his wife at the local hospital

programme.title: Labyrinth
programme.desc: A woman's seemingly perfect life falls apart when she catches another woman in the arms of her fiance. Things get worse when she is kidnapped but all is not as it seems.
